verses.roman:
prabhu-kṛpā pāñā duṅhe dui hāta yuḍi'
dīna hañā stuti kare vinaya ācari'

synonyms: prabhu-kṛpā—the Lord's mercy; pāñā—getting; duṅhe—both of them; dui—two; hāta—hands; yuḍi'-folding; dīna hañā—most humbly; stuti kare—offer prayers; vinaya ācari'-with submission.
translation: After receiving the Lord's causeless mercy, the brothers folded their hands and in great humility offered the following prayers unto the Lord.
